    • imports

      public Invoice imports(@NotNull @NotNull net.tangly.core.domain.DomainAudit audit, @NotNull @NotNull Reader reader, @NotNull @NotNull String source)
      Imports a JSON invoice into the domain.
      Parameters:
      reader - reader for the character stream of the JSON file. JSON files are always character-based. The reader is closed upon use.
      source - name of the JSON source
      Returns:
      the newly created domain invoice object
